issue.message: mobileads version should be updated to 5.8.0

READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to query or interact with MediaStore or media files on the shared storage, you should instead use one or more new storage permissions: `READ_MEDIA_IMAGES`, `READ_MEDIA_VIDEO` or `READ_MEDIA_AUDIO`.
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to write to shared storage, use the `MediaStore.createWriteRequest` intent.
When targeting Android 13 or higher, posting a permission requires holding the `POST_NOTIFICATIONS` permission (usage from com.squareup.picasso.RemoteViewsAction.NotificationAction)
A newer version of com.google.android.material:material than 1.7.0 is available: 1.9.0
A newer version of com.yandex.android:mobileads than 4.0.0 is available: 5.8.0
A newer version of com.squareup.picasso:picasso than 2.8 is available: 2.71828
